channel.title: 8bit
channel.description:
Watched a youtube video the other day with a really hot 8bit song playing in the background, found a link to a website with loads of 8 bit on it. 8bc.org I was wondering if you guys had any good tracks to share? I don't know much about this genre, so any help in finding some more awesome tracks would be awesome.
Here's a track I love: http://8bc.org/music/4mat/Paper+Dolls/

item.title: 8bit
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

I love all of the original doom music, I assume it’s 8 or 16 bit, but I’m not positive. I believe I include them in MoparScape 3.2.

Read full topic

item.title: 8bit
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

I shamelessly searched thepiratebay.org for chip tunes and it only returned one good result which was a discography of a person called sabre pulse.

I’ve only listened to the 2008 album “Turbo city” that he did; I freaking love it. Love listening to it while driving.

Also love “Titan EP” that was in the discography, it’s a bit less 8 bit little bit more modern electronic but it’s pretty damned nice as well.

tl;dr if you like some 8-bit and want moar download sabre pulse discography.

Read full topic

item.title: 8bit
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

I like most the real 8/16-bit music. Chiptunes have a tendency to not be memorable at all with a few exceptions.

Read full topic
